subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Should deGrom beat the Dodgers in Game 5, it would be only the fifth time in the era of the five-game division series that a pitcher won Games 1 and 5 on the road.
snippet: Should deGrom beat the Dodgers in Game 5, it would be only the fifth time in the era of the five-game division series that a pitcher won Games 1 and 5 on the road.
